Went to bed instead of showering, was real tired. Woke up, as I usually do, at 2am to go to the bathroom and kept hearing a """"thump-thump-thump"""", startlling me; turns out it was my left arm clanging on the wall, dead as a doornail. I was in the middle of having another stroke! Linda called my son who met us half way to the hospital and received treatment. However, i learned later to NEVER do that - call 911 instead. As soon as they arrive the EMT's begin treatment, forwarding vitals to the hospital, etc. and saves ER admittance time, also. Took 3 days before they'd let me out of bed to take a shower; they agreed I was ripe, lol~

10209708626733621 so if you are grabbed from behind and don't know who it is you won't swing? Again, dunno if that's what happened but that's the rumors. We do not know if this woman attacked him from behind. How about we wait to hear this guys side of the story instead of only a fraction of the story? """"Normal people don't act out in a violent way like petulant children."""" Normal people wouldn't attack someone without knowing they would get attacked in return. If a woman physically attacks a man in any way he has every right to defend himself how he feels is necessary. Oh and by lumping trump supporters into a category of deplorable makes you one of Hillary's deplorable supporters.
